A proper test post

01 Feb 2014

A proper test post

So, we've done manymany test posts.. none with any real test of the prose UI. We could try it a little harder by actually adding some more realistic content.

So, thanks to prose.io, Jekyll, and GitHub we have a simple blogging engine! A nice, easy user interface and a free shared platform with all the features we need. :)
